name: Stratacution Ventures
tag_list: venture-capital-consulting, raising-venture-capital, professionally-written-business-plans, development-of-investor-pitch-decks, investor-matching, private-placements, capital-raising, venture-capital-intermediary-firm
overview:
Stratacution Ventures is a venture capital intermediary firm representing companies seeking venture capital. We are based in San Diego with branches in New York, and we have successfully raised money for clients throughout the U.S.

We are focused on the preparation of venture capital capitalization strategies for emerging companies within the global market as they grow to become more competitive in their designated industries. Our company is dedicated to aid small businesses with annual revenues up to $30 million raise funds from $250,000 to $10,000,000 through private offerings.

Privately owned, Stratacution Ventures has been built upon the standard of strengthening the financial structure within companies seeking successful capital infusions. Working with several growing companies within the technology, retail, and mass market sectors across the globe, we have developed exceptional knowledge of capital raising strategies and the ways to successfully implement them into venture capital preparation services.

We offer clients innovative financial solutions to meet the capital needs of their companies. Our approach includes venture capital consulting, professionally written business plans, development of investor pitch decks, investor matching, private placements, and executing successful capital raises.

external_links.title: Creating a Business Plan that Successfully Raises Capital
